name: Shuffle Scuffle
description:
you're trying to do a ritual, but all you have is some magic cards and you don't remember what you need to do! try not to let everything go terribly wrong...

made by cakeknuckles and jellicube for ludum dare 41, for the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres". 

unfortunately, this is pretty unfinished... there's no way to complete the game currently.

sorry! we tried our best.
